summary: batch update choice jit product stock by skuId
description: batch update choice jit product stock by skuId

query.name: site
query.description: The country site of the queried Product

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/choice/stock/edit')
request.add_api_parameter("item_id", "2616344300")
request.add_api_parameter("site", "SG")
request.add_api_parameter("sku_edit_stock", "{ 314525867:10, 314525868:11 }")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/choice/stock/edit')
request.add_api_param('item_id', '2616344300')
request.add_api_param('site', 'SG')
request.add_api_param('sku_edit_stock', '{ 314525867:10, 314525868:11 }')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: The item id in the request does not exist in the current store or the CHOICE item has not yet been reviewed by Lazada, updating inventory is not supported.

Non-JIT items do not support inventory modification, please call GetChoiceProducts or GetChoiceProductItem API to query the bizSupplement field, only if the field value is 3 or 4 can you call this API to modify inventory.
Seller authorization is not a choice authorization, please ask the seller to re-authorize and select the 'country - choice' option to complete the choice store authorization.
The item id in the request does not exist in the current store or the CHOICE item has not yet been reviewed by Lazada, updating inventory is not supported.
